variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Deidentified Subject's ID

variable.name: Affection_status_ID
variable.description: IBS or Control
variable.comment: IBS designation classified by ROME III UMSL Concept ID C0022104.

variable.name: Sex
variable.description: Gender of participant

variable.name: Age_enr_years
variable.description: Age of Participant at enrollment

variable.name: Ethnicity
variable.description: Ethnicity of the Participant

variable.name: Sample_Collection_Location
variable.description: Site where biospecimens were collected

variable.name: Body_site
variable.description: Body site of sample collection

variable.name: Mean_Pain_A
variable.description: Mean Pain - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: MeanMax_Pain_A
variable.description: MeanMax Pain - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: #_Pain_Episodes_A
variable.description: Number of Pain Episodes - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: Avg_#_Pain_Episodes_w/interference_A
variable.description: Average # of pain episodes with interference of activities - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: #_Pain_Interfer_Ratings_A
variable.description: Number of reported interference ratings - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: Perc_Interfernce_episodes_rated_A
variable.description: Percent of rated Interference ratings - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: Perc_Diarrhea_A
variable.description: Percent diarrhea stool type - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: Perc_Formed_A
variable.description: Percent formed stool type - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: Perc_Mushy_A
variable.description: Percent mushy stool type - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: Perc_Hard_A
variable.description: Percent hard stool type - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: Bowel_Movement_14_Days_A
variable.description: Total number of bowel movements over 14 day period - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: IBSC_A
variable.description: Number classified as IBS Constipated - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: IBSD_A
variable.description: Number classified as IBS Diarrhea - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: IBSM_A
variable.description: Number classified as IBS Mixed - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: IBSU_A
variable.description: Number classified as IBS Unsubtyped - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: PERC_IBSC_A
variable.description: Percent classified as IBSC_A - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection

variable.name: PERC_IBSD_A
variable.description: Percent classified as IBSD_A - Diary A
variable.comment: Diary A - 14 day period after 1st stool sample collection
